title: Champs for a unranked skrub?

replies.body: What sort of champion do you prefer? And you should probably not play ranked until you have full tune pages and a good understanding of at least two champs for each lane, preferably three.

I finished my placement matches and was placed in Silver 5, I usually play with my friends and I'm the best laner out of all of them, so I continued to play mid but learned to play ADC. Learning how to top.

I probably won't play ranked for a while, and I am planning to get multiple champions for mid and top. Don't really want to play ranked 'til I get better, so that people won't be more toxic than  {{champion:17}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:29}} and    {{champion:69}} combined.

Then play tanks mid is not very forgiving. But {{champion:1}} mid and {{champion:111}} top is rather forgiving with shield and Q escape/ engage. I used Ziggs {{champion:115}} mid to farm and push last season but he isnt very meta now. Still safe farm and pressure constant and waveclear with nice team fights and kiting potential just not easy to get kills then snowball hes passive lane then mid to late poke and seige
In no alternate reality is annie a tank. Rofl.
lol nah she just is mobile. plus rocket belt and on demand nuke stun... and builds rod. not tank but tanky and cc to be forgiving for mid lane unlike most midlaners

Once I improve a LOT, I'm planning on getting {{champion:85}}, {{champion:245}}, and{{champion:112}} . {{champion:112}}   has no escape moves, but I like his kit, along with {{champion:85}}  and {{champion:245}} . Apparently {{champion:90}}  is supposed to be decent.
